SELECT sum(speed) as speed,periodDate,dataDate from ( select TYPE, AVG(Speed) as speed, TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi')||':00' as periodDate,
TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<15 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<30 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<45 then '30'
else '45' end as dataDate from PureWaterRealTimeData WHERE
DataDate >= #{beginDate} and DataDate <= #{endDate}
AND TYPE =#{waterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY TYPE, TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi')||':00',
TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<15 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<30 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<45 then '30'
else '45' end ) group by TYPE,periodDate,dataDate
